subject: Customs
description_text:
Dear Sir/Madam
We had a problem with the ups. And they charged us with 25356.00 HUF or 63,25eur because of that i would like to ask if you would compensate us?
Fritz Marton

conversations.body_text: Hi Fritzmarton7,     Your order has been shipped. Here is the latest tracking information—please take a look.

Hi, Thank you very much! Is there a haptic reactor only for the brake? Az iPhone-omról küldve 2025. jún. 22. dátummal, 4:36 időpontban service@simsonn.com írta: ﻿ 
 
 Hi Fritzmarton7, 
 
 Your order has been shipped. Here is the latest tracking information—please take a look. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 On
 Wed, 18 Jun at 3:15 AM
 , Fritzmarton7 <fritzmarton7@gmail.com> wrote:
 Dear Simsonn 
 FAQ said,that if i haven’t got any message about my shipment in 1-2days, then i can ask you if everything is alright so do you know anything about my shipment? 
 Fritz Marton 
 Am 2025. 06. 15. um 20:57 schrieb SIMSONN
Hi Fritzmarton7,     This is the haptic feedback motor for the brake. You will also need a power supply to use it properly.       https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor
Hi Fritzmarton7,     Can you provide us with a customs bill, it's not usually such a hefty tax.

合并来自工单764  
      主题: Customs  
      描述:  I received an email from customs that i need to pay 94 eur? Is this real ? Thank for tha answer Az iPhone-omról küldve
Hi Fritzmarton7,    Regarding the customs duty issue, I will have our sales team get back to you tomorrow.

Thank you!
Az iPhone-omról küldve

> 2025. jún. 25. dátummal, 16:21 időpontban service@simsonn.com írta:
> 
> ﻿
> Hi Fritzmarton7,
> 
> Regarding the customs duty issue, I will have our sales team get back to you tomorrow.
> 
> 
> 
>
Hi Fritzmarton7, please provide us with a copy of the bill and we will reimburse you for a part portion.

Dear Simsonn
Here is a copy of my bill.
Thank you for the fast response.
Fritz Márton

service@simsonn.com
Hi Fritzmarton7,    We will pay the ‘Brokerage fees’ charged by the courier company for paying the taxes, which is $15.36, and cover the $10 tax for you. We will refund you $25.36, please confirm.

Dear Simsonn,I think a slightly larger compensation would be reasonable. I
suggest to refund the gross brokerage fee (HUF 6655) and half of the VAT
(9351), the whole compensation would be USD 47.
Thank you for your comprehension. Fritz Maton

service@simsonn.com

Hi Fritzmarton7,     Sorry, it is not our responsibility to pay the tax, we will let out part of our profit to compensate our customers, but we can't afford too high fees, thank you for your understanding!

Ok than it would be good if  you would give me the earlier offer so
 $25.36.

service@simsonn.com
Hi Fritzmarton7,     Okay, we've refunded you, please check. Have Fun!
